mapper.select: SELECT A.CEX_NO, A.TRM_CD, A.DISEASE_CD, TO_CHAR(A.cex_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cex_date, A.CEX_STATUS , C.PA_NO, C.PA_NAME FROM V_CEX A INNER JOIN RECEPTION B ON A.RCP_NO = B.RCP_NO INNER JOIN PATIENT C ON B.PA_NO = C.PA_NO WHERE C.PA_NO = #{paNo} AND A.CEX_STATUS = 'T'

SELECT A.cex_no, A.cex_cbc, A.cex_ecg , A.cex_ua, A.cex_pfts, TO_CHAR(A.cex_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cex_date , A.cex_ne, A.emp_no, A.cex_status, A.trm_cd , B.medi_record, B.trm_dt, B.rcp_no , C.PA_NO , D.PA_NAME FROM clinical_examination A INNER JOIN TRM_CHART B ON A.trm_cd = B.TRM_CD INNER JOIN RECEPTION C ON B.RCP_NO = C.RCP_NO INNER JOIN PATIENT D ON C.PA_NO = D.PA_NO WHERE CEX_NO = #{noname}

SELECT A.ICD_NAME, A.TRM_CD, A.DISEASE_CD, A.CEX_STATUS , C.PA_NO, C.PA_NAME FROM V_CEX A INNER JOIN RECEPTION B ON A.RCP_NO = B. RCP_NO INNER JOIN PATIENT C ON B.PA_NO = C.PA_NO WHERE A.CEX_STATUS IS NULL
